alfredsnippet.snippet:
ax = df.sort_values(by='',ascending=True).plot(kind='barh',
                                 color='c',
                                title='',
                                figsize=(12,8))
ax.set_xlabel('')
ax.set_ylabel('')
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.annotate(str(int(p.get_width())), 
                (p.get_x() + p.get_width(), p.get_y()),
                xytext=(16, 0),
                textcoords='offset points',
                horizontalalignment='right')
alfredsnippet.name: plot barh pandas example 2
